header_text: You are shopping at the mall, and in line to check out. When you reach into your pocket, you realize your wallet is missing. You don't know where you misplaced it, and realize that your memory lately has been bad.

elements.Text: Are you mad at yourself that you misplaced your wallet for a moment?

elements.name: You are shopping at the mall, and in line to check out. When you reach into your pocket, you realize your wallet is missing. You don't know where you misplaced it, and realize that your memory lately has been bad. _Finances_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
